lines.text: Dagnabbit, who left this hog waller here?

[singing about Ma]
She's got hair that goes to the ground/She takes two steps and she falls right down.

[singing]
Ha ha ha, hee hee hee, next year I'll be a hundred and three.

[singing]
There ain't no gold in them 'thar hills, it's mighty cold in them 'thar hills.
